title: Textile, "Hillston Moire", 1987
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed and glazed on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: Along each side, " HILLSTON MOIRE Designed By EDDIE SQUIRES for The AUSTRALIAN COLLECTION By WARNERS copyright (symbol) MCMLXXVII By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top".
dimensions:
Warp: 355cm (140in.). Weft: 143cm (56 1/4in.) both selvedges present.
Pattern: Height of repate:64cm (25 1/4in.0
description: Stripes of fine lines alternate stripes of fine lines over a pattern. 2 blues, green, maroon and peach. Pattern takes up 137.5cm (54 1/4) leaving a margin of white at each side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Hillston Moire", 1987.
1987. Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed and glazed on plain weave foundation.. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-24.
